name: Snake Game (Formal Snake)
description:
A game made for the GMTK game jam.

The theme was: Roll of the dice.

Concept inspired by: squid game.

How does it follow the theme? It follows the theme by selecting a difficulty and the level, incorporated with a little story.

This game is not complete, and all of the music belongs to NCS (Non copyright sounds)

I made all of the code myself, and art.
